titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Where in the Parliament holden at Westminster, in the thirteenth yeere of the Queenes Maiesties raigne, amongst other things, there was one acte and statute made, intituled an Acte against vsurie ...
Proclamations. 1581-05-19
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker [i.e. B. Norton a. J. Bill], printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's names and publication date from STC.
